summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Thirty-first Avenue from East Pike Street to East Howell Street; Thirtieth Avenue from East Union Street to East Howell Street, Twenty-sixth Avenue from East Union Street to East Howell Street, and East Pike Street from Twenty-sixth Avenue to Thirty-second Avenue; all in the City of Seattle, by grading the same, in accordance with Resolution No. 556 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
